page.title: 08Employment in Our Area
page.content: The unemploymet in our area is mainly made up of youngsters. There are a few unemployed elders. A few people are out of work due to disablement. The elders that are employed have a range of different jobs. There are a few council workers. There are also gas, electricity and water board workers. Quite a few people in our grid are self employed. Farming provides a good deal of employment as well. In our grid there are 2 shops for the whole area and 14 farms. There are a few home helps in our area. There are also a couple of house-to-house hairdressers. There are some factory workers in our area although the factories are out of our grid.
